name: Circus strong man doll - Purple and cream
description:
At Drop the Weasel I believe that everyone should have their own strong man around the house, so I set about creating some to send out into the world!!

This guy may be small but he's oh so strong and manly. He's one of only 8 for sale at Drop he Weasel so move fast!!

I've used artists canvas which has been stitched, stuffed and then painted with a white primer to make the basic strong man shape.

Then the fun begins... I then paint all the detail by hand using acrylic art paints. To finish off I've given each strong man a thin coat of artists varnish, this helps to keep them clean and gives them a tactile leathery feel.

Because these guys are painted by hand no two are ever the same making each one an individual character with a little glint in his eye.

This particular little fellow is 'wearing' a purple and cream stripy top and has bright blue eyes, and just look at that hairy chest too, ooh la la!!

Size: approx 200mm (head to base) and 140mm (across the shoulders)

Thanks for dropping by Drop the Weasel. Pop by again soon!

name: Felt pin -brown hand embroidered multicoloured brooch pin
description:
This is a Drop The Weasel classic! 

A hand cut and hand embroidered felt disc brooch. I call these doodle discs because I start them with no idea what they will end up looking like, I just doodle with the needle and thread!!

Each felt brooch is approimately 50mm across (at the widest part) and are made up of a disc of felt which has been embriodered using silk threads, some have appliqued felt added and some have the added touch of a button. 

The reverse side of these brooch pins have been neatly finished with a metal brooch clasp covered in another felt disc in a contrasting colour to the front one. 

This particular brooch pin has been created using Autumnal colours, brown, tan and orange with a little yellow button in the centre.

Thanks for popping by Drop the Weasel!

name: Hand draw wooden brooch pin - little bird
description:
This is a wooden brooch pin with a hand drawn design of a little blue bird framed in a polka dot border.

The brooch pendant has been hand cut and shaped using light weight wood. 

The pendant has been painted with cream acrylic paint with the hand drawn design applied with a blue art pen, it has then been lightly varnished and attached to a vintage pin for hanging.

Size of the pin is : approx 45mm long
Size of the brooch pendant: approx 24mm x 24mm, thickness 4mm

There are more brooch pins like this at Drop the Weasel...take a look!!

Thanks for popping by Drop the Weasel.

name: Beautiful hand stitched stuffed felt heart decoration - pale pink/multicoloured
description:
This lovely felt heart has been hand cut and hand sewn using excellent quality felt.

The main colour of the heart is pale pink with multicoloured appliqued circles applied to the surface using contrasting silk threads. 

The reverse of the heart is plain pink. 

To allow this heart to be hung a ric-rac hanging thread has been added.

The heart has been stuffed createing a plump feel and look. 

Size: at the widest part: approx 110mm, from the middle to the heart tip: 80mm

Please note colours may be slightly different to the one in the photograph please contact me to if this is an issue and I can tell you what I have in stock.

Thanks for popping by Drop the Weasel!!

name: A signed, unframed limited edition print of Japonica, size: 420mm x 590mm
description:
A limited edition print of an original acrylic painting called Japonica. 

The print run for this image is just 75 copies.

The image is of Japonica's head and shoulders and has been printed in lovely bright colours. The main colour being bright blue.

The image has been printed onto a heavy uncoated matt paper which gives a smooth finish.

Each print has been numbered and signed by the artist and is ready to be framed.

name: Lavender filled felt lady - purple
description:
Brighten up a corner of your home with this lovely hand cut and hand sewn felt lady lavender bag.

Each one of my lady lavender bags are slightly different making each one unique. To create the flowers and the eyes I use my felt remnants and scraps so if you place an order you may not get the exact same lavender bag as shown in the photograph, it will however have purple hair and look very similar to the ones show.  

Each bag can be hung from a hook or door knob by the funky ric-rac handle. Because these little ladies are filled with quality lavender the beautiful aroma will stay in the air for quite some time and if the scent starts to fade then just give them a scrunch and they will smell fresh again.

name: Hand painted bird softie - black
description:
This is a hand sewn and hand painted bird softie decoration.

From the tip of the tail to the tip of the beak it is approx 17cm long and from back to belly approx 8cm.

This is not a toy and the nest is not included.
